## R

Google 'Download R', choose 'https://www.r-project.org', and follow the 'CRAN' links to download R for your OS.

---

## RStudio

Google 'Download RStudio', and follow the links.

Choose 'Open Source License'.

---

## RStudio Set up

Tools - Global Options - General: Uncheck restore .RData into workspace at start up.

Tools - Global Options - General: Choose 'never' for Save workspace to .RData on exiting.

Tools - Global Options - Code - Saving: Choose 'UTF-8' for default text encoding.

View - Panes - Console on Right

---

## Class Folder with Data

Download 'urbanecon.zip' from Canvas - Files menu.

Unzip it onto any folder on your computer.
